```{r scraping data}

eu_members <- read_html('https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Member_state_of_the_European_Union', skip = 0)

eu_member_info <- eu_members %>%
  html_nodes("table") %>%
  `[[`(8) %>%
  html_table()

gold_medals_scraping <- gold_medals_scraping[,2:3]

names(gold_medals_scraping) <- c("Country", "Gold Medals")

gold_medals_scraping <- gold_medals_scraping %>%
  mutate(Country = factor(Country, levels = Country)) %>%
  filter(Country != "Totals (10 nations)")

gold_medals_scraping %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Country, y=`Gold Medals`)) + geom_col() + ggtitle("Number of Gold Medals in 2008 Beijing Olympics")

```
